title: HORIZONTAL
description: Our Horizontal service specializes in flat lay photography, offering an ideal solution for clothing, accessories, and objects presented in a top-down view. Thanks to our specific setup and expertise, we guarantee perfectly aligned images with consistent quality, essential for a professional presentation of your products online.
features: Specific setup for flat lay photography
Optimized lighting to eliminate unwanted shadows
Ideal for clothing, accessories, and flat objects

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.content: Horizontal photography allows you to present your products in a clear and detailed manner, ideal for e-commerce catalogs. Our service ensures perfect visual consistency across all your products, thus strengthening the professional image of your brand.

items.title: Fashion
items.description: Optimal presentation of clothing and textiles

items.title: Accessories
items.description: Highlighting details of bags, shoes, and jewelry

items.title: Stationery
items.description: Precise capture of books, magazines, and documents

items.title: Flat Objects
items.description: Perfect rendering for any product presented flat
